title: Tenant Member
description: Represents a single user within a tenant, explicitly linking their user identity to their cognitive PersonThread entity.

user_id.description: The global unique identifier for the user from the authentication system (e.g., Auth0 user ID).

thread_id.description: The entity_id of the PersonThread that represents this user within the cognitive manifold. This is the crucial link between identity and cognition.

permissions.description: A list of specific permissions granted to this member.
